com.king.zxing

类 ViewfinderView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.king.zxing.ViewfinderView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public final class ViewfinderView
extends android.view.View
    This view is overlaid on top of the camera preview. It adds the viewfinder rectangle and partial transparency outside it, as well as the laser scanner animation and result points.
